ðŸ“– Summary: Ubicloud is an open-source platform that enables users to build and manage their own cloud infrastructure on bare metal servers, offering an alternative to proprietary cloud providers like AWS. It provides essential IaaS features such as elastic compute, block storage, firewall, load balancer, managed Postgres, and IAM services. Ubicloud can be used as a managed platform or self-hosted, providing greater control and cost savings.
